lead_paragraph: In recent months, Colin Kaepernick has become comfortable with people getting to know him as more than a laser-focused football player the way he had always preferred it.

headline.print_headline: Kaepernick Lets People Know Him as More Than a Quarterback
headline.main: Kaepernick Lets People Know Him as More Than a Quarterback
